faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does an investor visa remain valid?
items.answer: These last for 2-3 years, depending on your unique investment type. However, you can renew them to continue scaling your business.

items.question: Can I start a business or work in the UAE using an investor visa?
items.answer: Yes, you can live, work, invest, and kickstart a business in the UAE with a Dubai investor visa.

items.question: Are there any perks of securing an investor visa?
items.answer: You get legal residency, global banking access, business ownership rights, travel ease, family sponsorship, and an Emirates ID.

items.question: Can I open a corporate bank account using a UAE investor visa?
items.answer: Yes! You can apply for a personal or corporate bank account using a valid investor visa or Emirates ID.

items.question: Can I sponsor my spouse and children with an investor visa?
items.answer: Yes! A UAE investor visa allows you to sponsor your loved ones for a 5 to 10-year period.
